title: IFrame component
description: Schema that describes the layout configuration for an IFrame component.

sandbox.title: Sandbox
sandbox.description: Controls the sandbox attribute on the iframe. See: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/iframe#sandbox

allowPopups.title: Allow popups
allowPopups.description: Sets "allow-popups" in the sandbox attribute on the iframe. See: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/iframe#sandbox

allowPopupsToEscapeSandbox.title: Allow popups to escape sandbox
allowPopupsToEscapeSandbox.description: Sets "allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox" in the sandbox attribute on the iframe. See: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/iframe#sandbox

renderAsSummary.title: Render as summary
renderAsSummary.description: Boolean or expression indicating if the component should be rendered as a summary. Defaults to false.

hidden.title: Hidden
hidden.description: Boolean value or expression indicating if the component should be hidden. Defaults to false.

grid.title: Grid
grid.description: Settings for the components grid. Used for controlling horizontal alignment.
